name: Bomb Brawlers
description:
In this brawler, two players use the same keyboard to control  characters who must fight to keep their points. This was made for the GMTK game jam and follows the theme of dual purpose game design in the following ways: 

  • Points act as health so when health is lost it subtracts from the points.
  • The bombers act as an enemy/obstacle and also give you points if delivered to the base.
  • The jump button is used to jump and also glide at certain points.
  • Shooting can damage your opponent but also costs points to fire.
